resources.string:
The “Number Place Breaker” automatically solves Number Place puzzles, also known as Sudoku, only by taking a picture of a puzzle. It is not a practical application; Please consider it as an experiment or a proof-of-concept. There is no guarantee this app works correctly. Please use it on your own risk. 
 
Full source code of this program is available on Github at http://github.com/AlissaSabre/NumberPlace 
 
HOW TO USE THIS APP 
 
1. Touch [Capture] to start the camera. 
 
2. Take a picture of a Number Place puzzle by touching anywhere on the screen. 
 
3. Check the captured puzzle. There may be erros. You can correct them by touching the puzzle board. 
 
4. Touch [Solve] to let the app solve the puzzle and show the answer. 
 
NOTE ON OpenCV Manager 
 
This app internally uses another app, “OpenCV Manager” for image processing. It is available on Google Play for free. The Number Place Breaker prompts you when it is needed. Please install it if you want to use Capture function. It can't capture a puzzle unless OpenCV Manager is installed. 
 
CREDITS 
 
Number Place Breaker is written by Alissa Sabre (http://alissa-sabre.cocolog-nifty.com). 
 
The solver part of this work was inspired by an excellent article by Naoyuki Tamura available as http://bach.istc.kobe-u.ac.jp/copris/puzzles/
